reviewText:
Playboy / Girls of Spring Break is fifty-seven minutes and was released on video on November 19, 1991. Most of the video is shot in Daytona Beach, Florida. The ladies at the beach and in the segments are sexy and great to look at. Playmate Tina Bockrath makes an appearance. Here is a list of the ladies in order of appearance.

Carolyn O'Briant-Paints her body so she is never truly nude
Kari LaCroix-Nude in photo shots & topless most of the time and very little nudity in the segment
Michelle Mullica & Wendy Christine-Nude in the hot tub and with a fur coat
Brittney Rache-Topless a few times in her shoot
Brittney Rache & Tina Bockrath (Playmate of the Month for May 1990)-Strip nude in a cowboy segment
Christy Hedrick-Nude in her photo shoots
Joan Donato-Starts off topless and is fully nude most of the times
Andi Carey-Nude in her photo shoots and topless only in her segment
Cherish Cass-No nudity but looks great in her bikini
Ramah Tabory-Topless only
Soula Theo-Nudity about 20% of the time

The only one I did not comment on is Angela Brooks because she got very little air time. There is really no difference between the VHS and DVD version. The VHS version comes with a preview of Playboy's College Girls and the DVD version comes with no previews. The college girls are great in this video. Playboy / Girls of Spring Break get a B+.
